title: how do I contact google to repair my pixel 2 when I am in hk
content:
I bought my pixel 2 in the US google store. It is still under warranty. I want to send it to the US to have it repaired
However, as I am now in hk, I cannot contact google through online chat or phone(it says the service is not available). What should I do then? Is there any other to contact with the repair team?
